title: Quinebaug & Shetucket Rivers Valley National Heritage Corridor: Directions & Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation             Directions       Getting There  Car Major access roads are I-84 from Hartford and I-395 from the New London area and Worcester. Within the heritage corridor, a 32-mile section of Conn. Route 169 is a National Scenic Byway and 19.5-mile section of Conn. Route 49 is a State Scenic Byway.
